title: Relates to limiting the amount of awards in medical malpractice lawsuits
summary: Relates to limiting the amount of awards in medical malpractice lawsuits; limits such awards to the amount of malpractice insurance held by the defendant; establishes the excess medical malpractice liability fund.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to limiting the amount of awards in medical malpractice lawsuits; and to amend the insurance law, in relation to establishing the excess medical malpractice liability fund
